# Article

This is an article.

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(reticulate)
```

```{python}
from itertools import chain, count, cycle, islice, repeat, starmap

def join(*s):
	return ''.join(s)

def run(n: int):
	print('\n'.join(islice(starmap(join, zip(map(str, count(1)), repeat('\t'), cycle(chain(repeat('', 2), [''.join(map(chr, [102, 105, 122, 122]))])), cycle(chain(repeat('', 4), [''.join(map(chr, [98, 117, 122, 122]))])) )), n)))

run(30)

```
